channel.title: chrome on Alfred Nutile
channel.description: Recent content in chrome on Alfred Nutile

description.p: Getting Chrome run was “easy” thanks tothis post
My install has behat running inside of a vagrant box so my behat.yml talks to Selenium running on my Mac and uses my Macs Chrome

pre.code: default: paths: features: behat/features bootstrap: features/bootstrap formatter: name: pretty extensions: Behat\MinkExtension\Extension: default_session: selenium2 goutte: null selenium2: wd_host: "http://192.168.33.1:4444/wd/hub" capabilities: { "browserName": "chrome", "browser": "chrome", "version": "25", 'chrome': {'switches':['--no-sandbox']}} base_url: 'http://cms.dev:8000/' browser_name: chrome

description.p: I placed chromedriver in /opt and just ran this
That was it. Now in my vagrant box I can run behat to open the chrome browser which happens to be faster for me than Safari and Firefox on this mac.
